title: Data Scientist at McKinsey Solutions
summary: Analytics professional with client facing experience and strong, diverse technical background including machine learning and AI solutions. Delivering business impact through a combination of practical problem-solving, application of best practice Advanced Analytics and leadership mindset.

experience.title: Senior Risk Consultant
experience.description: - Utilized non-parametric regression techniques to estimate future fatalities caused by pandemic events.

experience.title: Teaching Assistant
experience.description: - Lectured in Manufacturing System course for 4 semesters - Lectured in Engineering Problem Solving and Computation course for 2 semesters - Assisted in preparation of term and design projects - Developed course material and provided assistance for Manufacturing System (undergraduate), Mass Customization (graduate and undergraduate) Page 1 of 3 and Artificial Intelligence and Neural Network (graduate and undergraduate) courses

experience.title: Research ASsistant
experience.description: Member of IRIS Research Group - Developed Reinforcement Learning procedure for Kanban Routing in an disassembly/assembly setting - Applied machine learning techniques to various manufacturing problems for optimization purposes - Integrated Neural Network framework to conventional Reinforcement Learning procedure in order to enable application of Reinforcement Learning to problems with large state/action spaces - Proposed Reinforcement Learning framework for various Markov Decision Processes for optimal sequential decision making - Designed simulation models for RFID systems - Proposed a modularity metric for agile, adaptive and hybrid supply chains

education.title: Doctor of Philosphy (PhD), Industrial Engineering
education.description: Dissertation Title Reinforcement Learning-Based Approach for Disassembly and Remanufacturing Problems Proposed Application - Optimizing process efficiency in assembly/disassembly and production facilities - Introducing AI techniques to attain maximum autonomy with minimum human supervision - Enabling optimal decision making in constantly changing dynamic and uncertain environments - Proposed solution methodology is applicable to areas such as manufacturing/ production, logistics, healthcare and quality control
